'''Flowfire Blade''' is [[Traveler (Pyro)]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|Blazing Threshold or Scorching Threshold|1}}
** This particle generation can occur once every '''2.9''' seconds.
* Blazing Threshold attacks once every 1s.
* Scorching Threshold will also launch Coordinated Attack when an off-field character deals DMG to opponents, even though the talent description only mentions active character.
* While in Nightsoul's Blessing, the Traveler will consume 7.5 Nightsoul Points per second.
* When the Traveler's Nightsoul's Blessing state ends, any of their remaining Nightsoul Points will be depleted.
